ComicInfo.Title: The Wrong Side of the War, Part 2 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: In his new post as prison guard at the Imperial base on Kalist VI, Lt. Janek Sunber is forced to weigh what he knows he should do against what he can do when he comes up against the corrupt status quo. But conflict with his fellow officers is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to challenges facing the young lieutenant. Unbeknownst to the Empire, the Rebels have infiltrated the base!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-31 21:44:59. [CVDB165538] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:31:26. [Issue ID 272841]
ComicInfo.Inker: Christian Dalla Vecchia,Davidé Fabbri,Christian Dalla Vecchia
